name: Tomato, Cucumber and Corn Salad
description: You can serve this refreshing mixture as a salad, as a topping for whole grains or as a salsa with grilled fish or chicken.
keywords: corn, cucumber, tomato, dairy-free, gluten-free, halal, healthy, kosher, low cholesterol, low-sodium, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 to 1 1/4 pounds ripe tomatoes, cut in small dice
1/2 European cucumber, 2 Persian cucumbers or 1 regular cucumber, peeled if waxy, seeded if the seeds are large, and cut in small dice
2 ears corn, steamed for 4 minutes and kernels removed from the cob
1 to 2 serranos or jalapeño pepper, minced (seeded for a milder salad), or 1/2 teaspoon Aleppo pepper
1 tablespoon fresh lime juice or lemon juice

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together all of the ingredients. Let sit in or out of the refrigerator for 15 minutes before serving, then toss again.
